{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.03367v1", "title": "Permanental ideals of symmetric matrices", "summary": "In this article, we study the ideal generated by $2\times 2$ permanents of a
symmetric matrix. We denote this ideal by $P_2(X)$ where $X$ is a symmetric
matrix. We compute a Gr\"obner basis, dimension, depth, minimal primes, and a
primary decomposition of $P_2(X)$. It can be seen that the answer is reliant on
whether the characteristic of the base field is two, and thus these ideals
constitute a class of ideals whose algebraic properties depend on
characteristics of the base field.", "main_category": "math.AC", "categories": "math.AC,math.AG", "published": "2025-05-06T09:39:45Z"}
